translations.Reading notes from filesystem has failed: Kusoma mazingatio kutoka kwa mfumo wa faili kumeshindwa.
translations.The Notes app is a distraction free note: The Notes app is a distraction free notes taking app for [Nextcloud](https://www.nextcloud.com/). It provides categories for better organization and supports formatting using [Markdown](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Markdown) syntax. Notes are saved as files in your Nextcloud, so you can view and edit them with every Nextcloud client. Furthermore, a separate [REST API](https://github.com/nextcloud/notes/blob/master/docs/api/README.md) allows for an easy integration into apps ([Android](https://github.com/nextcloud/notes-android), [iOS](https://github.com/nextcloud/notes-ios), as well as [3rd-party apps](https://github.com/nextcloud/notes/wiki#3rd-party-clients) which allow convenient access to your Nextcloud notes). Further features include marking notes as favorites.
translations.There are unsaved notes. Leaving the pag: Kuna madokezo ambayo hayajahifadhiwa. Kuondoka kwenye ukurasa kutatupa mabadiliko yote!
translations.Please see Nextcloud server log for deta: Tafadhali angalia logi ya seva ya Nextcloud kwa maelezo.
translations.Open in rich text mode: Fungua katika hali ya maandishi tajiri
translations.Remove any styles from the selected text: Ondoa mitindo yoyote kutoka kwenye maandishi uliyochagua
translations.Makes the current line a list element: Hufanya mstari wa sasa kuwa kipengele cha orodha
translations.Makes the current line a list element wi: Hufanya mstari wa sasa kuwa kipengele cha orodha chenye nambari
translations.Toggle heading for current line: Geuza kichwa kwa mstari wa sasa
translations.Set the current line as a big heading: Weka mstari wa sasa kama kichwa kikubwa
translations.Switch between editor and viewer: Badili kati ya mhariri na mtazamaji
translations.Write down your thoughts without any dis: Andika mawazo yako bila usumbufu wowote.
translations.File extension for new notes: Kiendelezi cha faili kwa madokezo mapya
translations.Use shortcuts to quickly navigate this a: Tumia njia za mkato ili kuabiri programu hii kwa haraka.
translations.Create a sample note with Markdown: Create a sample note with Markdown
translations.You cannot select images outside of your: Huwezi kuchagua picha nje ya folda yako ya madokezo. Folda yako ya madokezo ni: {folder}
translations.The file was not uploaded. Check your se: Faili haikupakiwa. Angalia kumbukumbu za seva yako.
translations.Install the app for your mobile phone in: Sakinisha programu kwa ajili ya simu yako ya mkononi ili kufikia madokezo yako kutoka kila mahali.
translations.You can now switch to use the easy to us: Sasa unaweza kubadilisha ili utumie kihariri cha maandishi tajiri kilicho rahisi kutumia na kuvuruga. Inakuruhusu kuhariri madokezo bila kuona alama zozote za Markdown.
translations.This option can also be changed later on: Chaguo hili pia linaweza kubadilishwa baadaye katika mipangilio ya programu ya madokezo
translations.Error during preparing note for deletion: Hitilafu wakati wa kuandaa dokezo la kufutwa.
translations.Error from Nextcloud server: {msg}: Hitilafu kutoka kwenye seva ya Nextcloud: {msg}
translations.The note has been changed in another ses: Dokezo limebadilishwa katika kipindi kingine. Tafadhali chagua ni toleo gani linapaswa kuhifadhiwa.
Dokezo ni la kusoma pekee. Huwezi kuibadilisha.
Imeshindwa kuhifadhi. Bofya ili kujaribu tena.
translations.Update conflict. Click for resolving man: Sasisha mzozo. Bofya ili usuluhishe wewe mwenyewe.
Tumia alama za Markdown kupamba maandishi yako.
translations.Start writing a note by clicking on “{ne: Anza kuandika dokezo kwa kubofya "{newnote}" katika uelekezaji wa programu.
translations.See JavaScript console and server log fo: Angalia konsole ya JavaScript na kumbukumbu ya seva kwa maelezo zaidi.
Imeshindwa kusasisha aina ya dokezo. Je! saraka inayolengwa inaweza kuandikwa?
translations.Me, you, and all our friends!: Mimi, wewe, na marafiki zetu wote!
translations.Nextcloud, a safe home for all your data: Nextcloud, nyumba salama kwa data zako zote
translations.It looks that the notes app was installe: Inaonekana programu ya madokezo ilisakinishwa kutoka kwa chanzo cha usanidi. Tafadhali isakinishe kutoka kwa Nextcloud App Store badala yake. Ikiwa unataka kuunda programu ya Vidokezo peke yako, tafadhali fuata maagizo ya developer.
